title: Is Bora-Hansgrohe Up to Task of Delivering Primož Roglič? ‘Our Goal is to Win the Tour de France’
content:
The German squad always punches above its weight. The arrival of Tour de France candidate Roglič means the entire organization will have to up its game.

Read the full article at Is Bora-Hansgrohe Up to Task of Delivering Primož Roglič? ‘Our Goal is to Win the Tour de France’ on Velo.
author: ahood
